definition: a sure gain/sth one is sure to obtain
settled/steady/stable
to hold/to seize/to catch/to apprehend/to take/(used in the same way as 把[ba3]: to mark the following noun as a direct object)
old variant of 拿[na2]
variant of 拿[na2]

sentences.english: Mark thought he had the job sewed up, but Jim got it.
sentences.chinese: 马克认为这件工作已经稳拿了，但吉姆得到了它。
